name: Trijam - Catastrophe
description:
CAT-astrophe

Oh snap! The old lady left the house for just a few minutes and the cat turned everything upside-down! An absolute cat-astrophe! That bloody cat just destroyed EVERYTHING! 

How long will it take YOU to cause total mayhem? Left click drag and release to shoot the cat across the room! This trijam submission has two levels.

I recommend downloading the game, the webGL version has only been tested on google chrome - not sure if other browsers will work

Time allocation:

  • Coding: 1hr
  • Art (Gimp): 1.5 hrs
  • Music and Sounds (Music Maker, BFXR): 0.5 hr

Color palette:

https://coolors.co/96bbbb-618985-414535-f2e3bc-c19875

Font credits:

Cotton Butter by Four Lines 

A game made in 3 hours for the Trijam #147, theme "just destroying stuff".
